name: 大贯勇辅

last_movies.title: 假面骑士极狐 × 假面骑士利维斯：电影大逃杀
钢之炼金术师 完结篇 最后的炼成
钢之炼金术师 完结篇 复仇者斯卡

introduction: Started dancing at age7, has performed in lots of works from at age 17. He is so crazy that plays various dances like ballet, jass, contemporary, modern, street (break, pop, house,rocking, hip-hop), acrobatics, gymnastics. His family is also talented phisically. His grandfather took part in a elimination round for Olympics, and his grandmother and mother used to be gymnasts. He's enough tall to add power in his performances. 2011,One of the most famous producer in Japan, Shuichiro Koike decided him a death dancer in a musical "Romeo and Juliette" 2012, he made a debut as an actor in "a cabaret" as Cliff. He showed his perfect dance in TV commercial in Shaddy, so that known as "Yusuke-kun in Shaddy" 2013, one of the most famous artist Inbal Pinto pointed him to act in "The cat that lived in a million times" Also, he got the leading role in the aucition by crazy talented Matthew Bourne to fly to England by himself. Jul 2013, acted the leading role in "DORIAN GRAY by Matthew Bourne", got 7000 people, was just great. 2014, he'll show around the world to take part in a dance company "BADBOYS of DANCE" by Rasta Thomas, who is popular all over the world, from USA. These years he's challenged TV shows as an actor, showed lots of aspect.
